Package ca.phon.app.session.editor.view.common

Class TierDataLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.phon.app.session.editor.view.common.TierDataLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, LayoutManager2
    public class TierDataLayout
extends Object
implements LayoutManager2
    Custom layout management for tier data. Layout implementation is decided by the currently selected algorithm.
